content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Sage Intacct integration enhancements for items

content_parts.content: When you integrate items with Sage Intacct, you can view the synchronization status on the Item page main list so that you don't need to navigate to another page to view statuses.

content_parts.title: Notifications for batch printing and mass sales and work allocation

content_parts.content:
A notification displays when a batch printing task is completed.

A notification displays when a mass allocation for sales or work orders is completed.

content_parts.title: Removal of standard cost period end dates

content_parts.content: To ensure item-site records costed at standard cost always have a current cost attributed to them, the Item-site page no longer provides a cost period end date.

content_parts.title: Customer on-hold and credit limit integration from Sage Intacct

content_parts.content:
When you integrate with Sage Intacct, the on-hold status and credit limit information for customers, along with the on-hold behavior, are synchronized from Sage Intacct.  Read-only properties were added to provide more insight into the financial position of the customer and align the solution behavior with Sage Intacct.

  • The credit limit is displayed on the Customer page.
  • The selected behavior when processing a sales transaction for an on-hold customer is displayed and refreshed from the Company page.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)")

content_parts.content: To enable reconciliation between the stock ledger and financial postings, the Stock valuation report page displays the total stock value for a single company or for one or more sites for a single company if the sites have the same currency. Additional run statuses are also provided.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Group multiple sales taxes into a tax zone

content_parts.content:
For legislations such as the US, you can set up tax zones that include multiple sales tax categories including city, county, state, and special taxes. When you ship to a customer where multiple taxes apply, you can assign an appropriate tax zone, so you no longer need to enter each tax category to each line of the transaction.

Use the Tax zone page to set up your tax zones based on your tax categories.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Distribution' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-57618,XT-57085,XT-56886,XT-56639,XT-56564,XT-55195,XT-51673)

content_parts.title: Allocation on a sales order fails when linked to a work order component line or purchase order line

content_parts.content: When a sales order line is linked to a work order component line or a purchase order line, the allocation is correctly performed on the sales order line when the associated receipt is posted.

content_parts.title: Stock shortage incorrectly calculated on sales order line

content_parts.content: Stock shortage calculations for a sales order line consider allocated stock when displaying the result in the detailed line panel.

content_parts.title: Variance amount excluding tax is incorrect

content_parts.content: On purchase invoices, the variance amount excluding tax displays the correct value.

content_parts.title: Creating a customer fails when integrating with Sage Intacct

content_parts.content: An error message is no longer displayed when integrating a customer with Sage Intacct.

content_parts.title: Customers sorted by ID and not name in the sales mass processes

content_parts.content: On the Mass sales shipment and Mass sales invoice creation pages, customers are sorted alphabetically by name and not by their ID in the sold-to and bill-to customer criteria.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Finance' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)")

content_parts.content: To ensure accurate financial records, use the Unbilled accounts receivable inquiry to reconcile discrepancies between goods shipped and corresponding customer invoices. You can export results as an Excel or CSV file.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Finance' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Finance' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
The unbilled accounts payable inquiry calculation result includes purchase credit memos linked to a purchase invoice. If the credit memo is linked to a purchase receipt, the unbilled quantities and amounts are not increased.

Unbilled accounts payable inquiries are limited to purchase managers.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Gateway' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-57618,XT-57085,XT-56886,XT-56639,XT-56564,XT-55195,XT-51673)

content_parts.content: When you include a custom field in the item-object mapping, the synchronization of the associated object works properly.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Manufacturing' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
To provide all levels of the organization that need to visualize or generate a print of a multilevel BOM, from the Bill of materials page, you can print all levels of the BOM down to the lowest level component or raw material, and export the list of components. The printed report can be for a single or multiple BOMs, and optionally include standard costs and instructions.
Note that before you can export the list of components, you need to download the PDF and open the list of components which is provided as an attachment.

content_parts.title: Item-site links to the BOM and routing

content_parts.content: To improve visibility and direct access to related setup data, the Item-sites grid includes links to the bill of material and routing for manufactured items.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Manufacturing' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-57618,XT-57085,XT-56886,XT-56639,XT-56564,XT-55195,XT-51673)

content_parts.title: Work order allocation not transferred to material tracking

content_parts.content: When stock is allocated to a work order component line, the allocation is automatically transferred to the material tracking transaction.
When the actual production cost of the finished item is different from the standard cost, the variance is posted to the production variance account specified on the posting class.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Platform' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R1 (36.0.0)")

content_parts.content: When you run a batch task, a notification icon alerts you that the task is complete. From the notification, you are able to download the document relevant to your batch task and view the batch task history.
You can now filter a group of lines by the different states of a checkbox or a switch.

content_parts.content: An administrator can give administrator rights to another user by mapping the persona's administrator rights to the connected user.

content_parts.title: Unable to turn MRP options ON in the Roles for System Administrator

content_parts.content: The user is correctly able to turn on the MRP permissions [Mrp Synchronization, Mrp Calculation] in Administration>Users and security>Roles

content_parts.title: Resolved an error on the Supplier page

content_parts.content: You can create a custom field in the Items grid and enter a value into it.

content_parts.title: Business entity import fails when integrating with Sage Intacct

content_parts.content: Integration with Sage Intacct no longer produces errors when the business entity name contains a comma.

content_parts.title: Applicative - Approve & Reject - Business Row Actions

content_parts.content:
For sales and purchasing documents, you can perform several key actions from the main list to save time.

Additional actions include:

  • Confirm
  • Submit for approval
  • Approve or reject
  • Delete
  • Post
  • Close

Actions available depend on the document type and your user permissions.

content_parts.title: Purchase return function with loading issue

content_parts.content: In the purchase return, the side panel is loaded successfully.

content_parts.title: Purchase credit memos: variences only display above the grid

content_parts.content: Variances display above the grid for purchase credit memos.
